src:
Man of the Match Manchester City vs Southampton: Kevin De Bruyne
03 Nov 2019, 00:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Southampton memberi perlawanan yang sengit untuk Manchester City pada pekan ke-11 Premier League, Sabtu (2/11/2019) di Stadion Etihad. Sempat unggul lebih dulu, Soton akhirnya kalah dengan skor 2-1 atas The Citizen.
Soton tampil bagus pada awal babak pertama. Bahkan, pada menit ke-13, James Ward-Prowse membobol gawang Ederson usai menyambut bola muntah hasil sepakan Amstrong.
Man City butuh waktu yang panjang hingga mampu menyamakan skor. Pasukan Josep Guardiola baru mencetak gol pada menit ke-70. Sergio Aguero dengan jeli menyambut umpan silang Kyle Walke untuk membuat skor menjadi 1-1.
Kyle Walker kemudian membawa Man City unggul 2-1. Bek kanan timnas Inggris mencetak gol pada menit ke-86, usai menerima umpan dari Angelino. Kyle Walker mencetak gol pertamanya musim ini.
text:
Man of the Match Manchester City vs Southampton: Kevin De Bruyne
Nov 3 2019, 00:56 by Bola.net
Soccer - Southampton gave fierce resistance to Manchester City in the 11th week of the Premier League on Saturday (11/02/2019) at the Etihad Stadium. Had superior first, Soton finally lost with a score of 2-1 over The Citizen.
Soton performed well at the beginning of the first round. In fact, in the 13th minute, James Ward-Prowse broke into Ederson's goal after welcoming the ball threw up the result of Armstrong kicking.
Man City takes a long time to be able to equalize the score. Josep Guardiola's men scored just in the 70th minute. Sergio Aguero was keen to welcome Kyle Walke's cross to make the score 1-1.
Kyle Walker then put Man City ahead 2-1. England national team right-back scored in the 86th minute, after receiving feedback from Angelino. Kyle Walker scored his first goal of the season.
